mapper.sql: DEPARTID, DEPARTNAME, USERID, CONNECTTELNO, CONNECTMOBILETELNO, FAXES, BRANCHID
mapper.insert: insert into OA.DEPARTINFO (DEPARTID, DEPARTNAME, USERID, CONNECTTELNO, CONNECTMOBILETELNO, FAXES, BRANCHID) values (#{departid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{departname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connecttelno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connectmobiletelno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{faxes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchid,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into OA.DEPARTINFO
DEPARTID,
DEPARTNAME,
USERID,
CONNECTTELNO,
CONNECTMOBILETELNO,
FAXES,
BRANCHID,
#{departid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{departname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{connecttelno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{faxes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update OA.DEPARTINFO
DEPARTNAME = #{departname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONNECTTELNO = #{connecttelno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONNECTMOBILETELNO = #{connectmobiletelno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAXES = #{faxes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRANCHID = #{branchid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where DEPARTID = #{departid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update OA.DEPARTINFO set DEPARTNAME = #{departname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONNECTTELNO = #{connecttelno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONNECTMOBILETELNO = #{connectmobiletelno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAXES = #{faxes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRANCHID = #{branchid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where DEPARTID = #{departid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select d.departname from Departinfo d,BranchInfo b where d.branchid=b.branchid and b.branchname=#{branchname}
select u.username,d.departname from DepartInfo d, UserInfo u where d.departid=u.departid and d.departname=#{departname}
